timeline.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: That comment is from last year or so... It only shows as a diff because the class was relocated
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: While this is being moved to a method, should add a persistent data tag for this rather than relying on the lore.
timeline.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: Definitely agree with this, not my code, just refactored it.
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: You should also check size after this first one. You're checking the intended initial behaviour and then a checked behaviour (dupe)
timeline.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: I know I could, doing it twice was just an exaggeration
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Not the biggest fan of using reflection in unit tests. You should be able to access the things you're making sure to test.
timeline.author: WalshyDev

replies.bodyText: Yeah me neither but we shouldn't expose that Config though, so Reflection is the best we can do to inject some values there
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.message: Added Unit Tests for Player Profile and related
A little bit more Unit Tests
Added a command to retrieve lost backpacks
Quick soulbound key to speed this up
Integrity! HiddenBackpack now accepts size, restored bp has 54
Messages fixes, Refactored HiddenBackpack to be dedicated to restored bp
Now cloning :/ Also fixed double key in messages
Added Unit Tests for NetworkManager and Network class
Added an additional validation and unit test
